name: YAIBA: NINJA GAIDEN Z
description: Step into a living comic book in this new take on the Ninja Gaiden series. Brandishing his ninja sword and the mecha weapons in his cyber arm, Yaiba slaughters zombies with brutal, over-the-top abandon. Will you slice enemies to pieces, crush them with Yaiba's cyborg arm or just rip off a zombie’s arms to use as nunchucks?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP (32-bit) Processor: Dual core CPU 2.5 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 9800 or better Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: Standard audio device
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 Processor: Quad core 2.7 GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460 or better Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1 audio device
